title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository providing the CLI and server to run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama, offering asyncio support and chat completions API compatibility.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node.js and browsers to interact with the Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package enabling Ollama models as LLM and chat components inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (now renamed Open WebUI) supporting chat, model management, RAG, and multi-user workspaces.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama providing synchronous and asynchronous APIs with Kotlin coroutines support.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal Python template showing how to build a RAG pipeline over local documents using Ollama embeddings and Chroma vector store.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings Ollama models into any Discord server with slash commands and thread support.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that adds local AI code completion powered by Ollama models, similar to GitHub Copilot but fully local.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Interactive CLI chat wrapper around Ollama with conversation history, markdown rendering, and customizable prompts.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin that integrates Ollama models for inline code generation, refactoring, and chat within the editor.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Community-built Rust crate providing strongly typed async/await bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-streamlit-chat
summary: Streamlit application template for a chat interface backed by any Ollama model with session memory and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama server and WebUI onto Kubernetes clusters with GPU node support.

title: ollama-rust-api
summary: Community Rust crate offering low-level HTTP bindings and high-level ergonomic client for Ollama.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models to be used as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.
